version_description:
v1.4.2
Widget
Continues seek button and other bug Fixes

Love VLC Mobile Remote?
Please take the time to write us a nice review, it'll help us a lot :)
Thanks
Fixed Widget not working on ios 9.3 or earlier versions issue

Widget background image scaling issue fixed
Performance improvement

** Now browse and play YouTube Videos on VLC
** Audio controls buttons added
** Minor bug fixes

v 1.4.6
** 'Added to playlist' indicator
** Open Playlist item containing folder
** Minor big fixes
** Set custom image background to remote control screen

- Improved UI for iPads
- Performance improvement & bug fixes

Users who paid for the app earlier and now seeing ads, please e-mail us, we'll send you a promo-code to remove ads.
Thanks
** New logo

v1.5.2
** Performance improvement

v1.5.4
** Performance improvement

** Apple Watch Support with Watch Complications
** Performance improvement

** Optimised for iPads
** Sort browse list
** Minor bug fixes on watch app

* Shows Album Art
* Pause/Play for incoming and out going calls (Option to disable in Settings)
* Improved browse list and playlist performance
* Hide YouTube screen option
* Tap & hold a button for info
* Minor bug fixes
--
Love VLC Mobile Remote?
Please take the time to write us a nice review, it'll help us a lot :)
Thanks

* Updated Portuguese Localisation
* Localised to Chinese & Spanish
* Minor Bug fixes
--
Love VLC Mobile Remote?
Please take the time to write us a nice review, it'll help us a lot :)
Thanks

* Localised to French, German and Italian

Love VLC Mobile Remote?
Please take the time to write us a nice review, it'll help us a lot :-)
Thanks

* Updated French, German and Italian localisation
* Bug Fixes

Love VLC Mobile Remote?
Please take the time to write us a nice review, it'll help us a lot :-)
Thanks

** Optimised to iOS 11
** Minor bug fixes and improved connection with VLC

** Overlapping layouts fixed on purchase screen
** Top notch support
** Minor bug fixes and improved connection with VLC
** Landscape mode bug fixes

** Font optimised to iOS dynamic font size setting
** Landscape mode enhanced
** Crashing while searching on browse list issue fixed

* Now set fast forward & rewind buttons skip interval
* Supports VLC 3.0
* Minor bug fixes

- Now play files from Media Library, UPNP, DLNA and all other VLC supported sources (On Playlist screen)
- Supports VLC 3.0

* Playlist not showing on some versions of VLC issue fixed
* Now tap on Slider to go to position

Tap and hold a button to know what it does.
Bug fixes and performance improvement.

* Supports VMR Connect, VMR Connect is a helper app to your PC & Mac to Setup VLC & Start VLC from your iDevice

Download VMR Connect from https://vlcmobileremote.com/download

Fixed Slider not updating issue
Fixed slide down gesture of controls screen conflicting with other controllers
Other bug fixes

* Improved Remote Screen layouts
* Enhanced Landscape mode experience
*Performance improvement & Bug Fixes
Performance improvement and bug fixes.

* Improved Remote Screen layouts
* Enhanced Landscape mode experience

Fixed Slider not updating issue
Fixed slide down gesture of controls screen conflicting with other controllers
Other bug fixes

* Supports VMR Connect, VMR Connect is a helper app to your PC & Mac to Setup VLC & Start VLC from your iDevice

Download VMR Connect from https://vlcmobileremote.com/download

v2.0
Now control Mouse, Keyboard and media player of your PC & Mac
Shutdown or restart your PC & Mac from ios devices
Also lot more new features
And as usual bug fixes & performance improvement :)

Enter key not working in keyboard issue fixed
App not opening in iOS 9 devices issue fixed
Crashing in remote screen when orientation changed issue fixed
Other numerous non fatal bugs are fixed

Added Haptic feedback feature(works only on supported devices).
Bugs fix and performance improvement.

App not opening on iOS 9 and 10 devices has been fixed.
Added Haptic feedback feature(works only on supported devices).
Bug fixes and performance improvement.

App crashing when notification tray is pulled down issue fixed.
Bugs fixes and performance improvement.

Tap and hold a button to know what it does.
Bug fixes and performance improvement.
Bugs fixes and performance improvement.
Improved UI & Performance

Control VLC, PC & Mac volume with iPhone/iPad volume keys
Bug Fixes
Performance Improvement
Bug Fixes

Volume Key Bug Fixed
Now watching Rewarded ad gets you 10 minutes of full features.
Bug Fixes
Supports iOS 14

Computers not saving on iOS 14 issue fixed
Supports iOS 14
Widget issue fixed
Bug Fixes

Tap & Hold Subtitle & Audio Track delay buttons for continues update
.srt file can be added as subtitle to current playing video

Tap & Hold Subtitle & Audio Track delay buttons for continues update
.srt file can be added as subtitle to current playing video
Performance Improvement

VLC Up button not working issue fixed
Automatically opens the previously connected controller
Bugs Fixed

Automatically Connects to available computer
App is not finding VMR Connect on latest version of iOS issue is fixed
Bug Fixes
